医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
围手术期免疫治疗可改善可切除 NSCLC 患者的无事件生存期研究人员表示，与单独的术前（新辅助）化疗相比，在手术前后添加围手术期免疫治疗可显着改善可切除早期非小细胞肺癌（NSCLC）患者的无事件生存期（EFS）来自德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Perioperative-immunotherapy-significantly-improves-event-free-survival-in-患者-with-resectable-NSCLC.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Perioperative-immunotherapy-significantly-improves-event-free-survival-in-患者-with-resectable-NSCLC.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c85ebfbb-c849-4b79-82b4-bc8c8b9127dd Thu, 16 May 2024 16:19:00 -0400 Perioperative immunotherapy improves event-free survival in patients with resectable NSCLC
KFF 健康新闻“健康是什么？”：禽流感成为下一个公共卫生挑战自从一种禽流感病毒传播到至少九个州的奶牛和至少一名奶牛场工人以来，公共卫生官员正在密切关注。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-Bird-flu-lands-as-the-next-public-health-challenge.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-Bird-flu-lands-as-the-next-public-health-challenge.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=38220501-6c4f-495e-9522-3beafdface21 Thu, 16 May 2024 16:09:00 -0400 KFF Health News' 'What the Health?': Bird flu lands as the next public health challenge
减肥手术可降低患有高胰岛素血症的肥胖女性患乳腺癌的风险减肥手术与肥胖女性患乳腺癌的风险降低有关。这些是哥德堡大学进行的一项研究的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Bariatric-surgery-linked-to-reduced-breast-cancer-risk-in-obese-women-with-hyperinsulinemia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Bariatric-surgery-linked-to-reduced-breast-cancer-risk-in-obese-women-with-hyperinsulinemia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c086158d-dbdd-4472-97aa-00605e485d6e Thu, 16 May 2024 16:07:48 -0400 Bariatric surgery linked to reduced breast cancer risk in obese women with hyperinsulinemia
研究表明发育多巴胺信号传导中断与 ASD 之间存在联系最近的证据表明多巴胺在神经发育中起着至关重要的作用。在一项新的研究中，研究人员证明了发育多巴胺信号传导中断与自闭症谱系障碍 (ASD) 之间的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Study-demonstrates-link- Between-disrupted-developmental-dopamine-signaling-and-ASD.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Study-demonstrates-link- Between-disrupted-developmental-dopamine-signaling-and-ASD.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1b44e243-2eb8-443e-871f-b885fb53f373 Thu, 16 May 2024 16:01:50 -0400 Study demonstrates link between disrupted developmental dopamine signaling and ASD
研究发现，脊椎按摩治疗可减少治疗坐骨神经痛的曲马多处方由大学医院 Connor Whole Health 的研究人员领导的一项新研究发现，与接受常规医疗护理的成年人相比，最初因新诊断的根性腰痛（坐骨神经痛）而接受脊椎按摩疗法的成年人在接下来的一年中服用曲马多的可能性显着降低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Chiropractic-care-reduces-tramadol-prescriptions-for-sciatica-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Chiropractic-care-reduces-tramadol-prescriptions-for-sciatica-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=82d1f6ba-43ec-4617-b4f7-3560eea0382c Thu, 16 May 2024 15:59:00 -0400 Chiropractic care reduces tramadol prescriptions for sciatica, study finds
研究强调了甲苯噻嗪和芬太尼组合在用药过量情况下的复杂性近年来，芬太尼的无管制使用和过量死亡急剧增加，当当局发现芬太尼中含有动物镇静剂甲苯噻嗪时，这一趋势变得更加令人震惊。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Research-highlights-complexity-of-xylazine-and-fentanyl-combination-in-overdose-cases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Research-highlights-complexity-of-xylazine-and-fentanyl-combination-in-overdose-cases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=788b87ea-7bef-467e-be83-e6431703743b Thu, 16 May 2024 15:54:45 -0400 Research highlights complexity of xylazine and fentanyl combination in overdose cases
体力活动有利于多动症儿童的认知发展注意力缺陷多动障碍会影响许多常见的童年里程碑和认知过程，例如决策、抑制控制、语言发展和目标设定。罗德岛大学运动机能学助理教授 Nicole Logan 的研究表明，体力活动有益于此类认知过程的发展，特别是对于那些在这些领域可能有改进空间的儿童。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Physical-activity-can-be-beneficial-for-cognitive-development-of-children-with-ADHD.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Physical-activity-can-be-beneficial-for-cognitive-development-of-children-with-ADHD.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ed532c66-c4a3-4fa9-bb86-f386a5b49d6c Thu, 16 May 2024 15:50:50 -0400 Physical activity can be beneficial for cognitive development of children with ADHD
8500万英镑资金支持国际社会应对抗菌素耐药性将在一次全球活动中宣布拨款 8500 万英镑，以支持国际社会应对日益严重的抗菌素耐药性威胁。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/c2a385-million-funding-to-support-the-international-community-in-tackling-antimicrobial-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/c2a385-million-funding-to-support-the-international-community-in-tackling-antimicrobial-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=94c88a59-9e81-43c1-a9a7-8d2ce6a4c3db Thu, 16 May 2024 15:32:37 -0400 £85 million funding to support the international community in tackling antimicrobial resistance
研究扩大了对疫苗诱导的免疫性血小板减少症和血栓形成的认识由弗林德斯大学和国际专家领导的新研究正在扩大对疫苗诱导的免疫性血小板减少症和血栓形成（称为 VITT）的了解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Research-expands-understanding-of-vaccine-induced-immune-thrombocytopenia-and-thrombosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Research-expands-understanding-of-vaccine-induced-immune-thrombocytopenia-and-thrombosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80b6c3a8-975e-4e0b-a6ca-e5874ab2bb08 Thu, 16 May 2024 15:29:16 -0400 Research expands understanding of vaccine-induced immune thrombocytopenia and thrombosis
HPV 疫苗接种可减少英格兰所有社会经济群体的宫颈癌《英国医学杂志》今天发表的一项研究发现，英国的人乳头瘤病毒 (HPV) 疫苗接种计划不仅与宫颈疾病的大幅减少有关，而且在所有社会经济群体中都发挥了作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/HPV-vaccination-reduces-cervical-cancer-across-all-socioeconomic-groups-in-England.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/HPV-vaccination-reduces-cervical-cancer-across-all-socioeconomic-groups-in-England.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25e79af2-cfd6-456f-9347-58fc7063a487 Thu, 16 May 2024 15:23:39 -0400 HPV vaccination reduces cervical cancer across all socioeconomic groups in England
